data.name: lblTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a title for job position

data.name: lblWeight.Help
data.value: Enter position weight as integral value. The more weight value, the more important this position is.

data.name: labelIsTeacher.Help
data.value: Check if this position is a teacher position. This will be used to distinct teachers from other employees.
